title: Sarah Richardson Seven Dishy Necklace
description:
The Seven Dishy Pod Necklace is hand carved in wax and cast in recycled sterling silver. Each piece is heated to a bright white sterling, with a high polished edge. Sarah Richardson’s collection ranges from everyday simple to extraordinary. The organic nature of her jewelry finds balance and symmetry through repetition. Each piece is finely crafted in California using traditional metalsmithing techniques in precious metals.

Pods approximately 0.5 in. D

Chain length adjustable to 18 in. L with toggle clasp
